data.name: Virgin Money Go Account
data.description: Bank like never before with a Virgin Money transaction account. Earn Virgin Money Points for how you spend and budget - with epic rewards all the way.

features.additionalInfo: Get Clever insights and real-time alerts
Get 8 Virgin Money points on every purchase, direct debit and BPAY payment when you meet the Monthly Criteria
New customers will earn 5,000 Bonus Virgin Money Points when you meet the welcome offer criteria. Offer ends 31/8/23.

Virgin Money Rewards is our all-new rewards program, available on Virgin Money transaction and savings accounts. It neatly bundles Virgin Money Points, epic perks and great experiences, all tailored to you. Whether you're spending big, saving hard, or simply building better money habits, we're all for recognising and rewarding you every day, not just someday.
Easily track your spending and understand your money habits
Your everyday Virgin Money Go Account comes perfectly paired with our high interest Virgin Money Boost Saver.
Use your mobile number or email address to receive PayID payments

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be at least 14 years of age to apply for a Virgin Money Go Account

fees.name: International Balance Enquiry
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when a balance enquiry is performed at an ATM outside of Australia. A fee may also be charged by the ATM and should be displayed on the screen before proceeding with the withdrawal.

fees.name: Trace
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each request to perform a trace on any transaction type.

fees.name: Bank Cheque
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each bank cheque that is produced and posted to an Australian address.

fees.name: Paper Statement - International
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each paper statement that is required to be posted to an International Address.

fees.name: Failed Transaction Dispute
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when a transaction dispute is unsuccessful.

fees.name: Unclaimed Monies
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when the unclaimed monies process starts which is after 7 years of inactivity.

fees.name: BPAY,Pay Someone, Card Transactions
fees.additionalInfo: There is no fee charged by Virgin Money for performing a BPAY Payment, Pay Anyone or making a card transaction. Merchants may charge fee in respect of card transactions which should be advised to you at the time of making the transaction.

fees.name: Domestic Emergency Card Replacement
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when we courier a card to you within Australia.

fees.name: Cheque Dishonour
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each Cheque deposit that is dishonoured on the same day that the dishonour takes place.

fees.name: Currency Conversion
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged for any International Transaction which includes: any transaction made in a foreign currency; or when any transaction is processed outside of Australia (in Australian dollars or a foreign currency). It is calculated as a percentage of the Australian dollar equivalent.

fees.name: Cash and Cheque Deposit
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each cheque or cash deposit that is made into your account.

fees.name: Paper Statement - Domestic
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each paper statement that is required to be posted to an address in Australia.

fees.name: Manual Statement
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when you request a manual statement to be generated and emailed to you. All statements are available on the Virgin Money App and can be accessed for closed accounts.

fees.name: Overdrawn Account
fees.additionalInfo: Charged once to your account when your account becomes overdrawn. If your account is brought into a credit balance and then subsequently overdrawn another fee will be charged.

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for each direct debit that is dishonoured on the same day that the dishonour takes place.

fees.name: Internation ATM Withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when a withdrawal is performed at an ATM outside of Australia. A fee may also be charged by the ATM owner and should be displayed on the screen before proceeding with the withdrawal.

fees.name: International Emergency Card Replacement
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when we courier a card to you internationally.

fees.name: Domestic ATM Withdrawal
fees.additionalInfo: We don't charge a fee to withdraw cash, however a fee may be charged by the ATM Operator and should be displayed on the screen before proceeding with the withdrawal. Most major bank ATMs do not charge a fee, giving you access to over 10,000 ATMs across Australia.

fees.name: Monthly Account Keeping
fees.additionalInfo: There are no monthly account keeping fees with our Virgin Money Deposit Accounts.

fees.name: Electronic Transaction Error Correction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when the bank is requested by you or the recipient Financial Institution or Biller, to correct an error you have made with a BPAY payment, using the 'Pay Someone' functionality, or NPP transaction.
